sn_aia_version.instructions: 1. Retrieve the list of software defect records to be analyzed. 2. For each defect record, extract the full defect context and relevant descriptive fields. 3. Use the Defect Keyword Tool to analyze each defect record for keyword group matches. 4. Assign each defect record to the keyword group with the highest match count. 5. Use the Final Defect Bucket Resolver to finalize the bucket assignment for each defect record. 6. Compile a summary of defect records grouped by their assigned buckets. 7. Present the grouped defect summary to the user.

sys_update_version.name: sn_aia_version_b9c69afa2b8f6210bdb7f808b891bfd8
